Title: Authorizes medical testing of inmates upon application for certain privileges for infection with certain diseases
Summary: Authorizes the medical testing for infection with the AIDS virus of certain inmates applying for certain inmate privileges such as marriage, temporary release program, and family reunions; authorizes the disclosure of such test results for such purposes; authorizes the notification of correctional personnel of inmates having symptoms of AIDS; authorizes commissioner to deny access of the inmate to such privileges if they test positive.
LawCode: Add §§144 & 145, Cor L; amd §1007, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law and the education law, in relation to providing for the medical testing of certain inmates upon application for certain privileges and authorizing the disclosure of such test results for such purpose and diagnosing of certain disease symptoms
